sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: Interested participants were provided with an information sheet and informed consent form and only those who signed the form and who agreed to participate in the study, were included. Research ethics clearance for the study was obtained from the South African Medical Research Council (Number EC021–8/2015). Permission to conduct the study was granted from the National Department of Health (NDOH), the SAIEH and SALGA.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: Caradee Wright is an Editorial Board Member for Public health. The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.title: Publisher’s Note
sec.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
